summary: Comprehensive e2e testing of MindSpace trauma-informed self-reflection tool. All backend APIs (21 tests) passed with 100% success rate. All frontend flows tested and working correctly: landing page, signup, login, dashboard, 10-question reflection survey, results page, and regulation tools (breathing exercise + grounding technique).
critical_code_review_comments: Protected routes properly redirect unauthenticated users
Beta mode access bypass is intentional and documented
Minor: Consider adding data-testid attributes to key UI elements for easier automated testing
seed_data_creation: Created multiple test users with TEST_ prefix for backend testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core flows verified: signup, login, 10-question survey with 0-3 scale, results display, breathing exercise (4-4-6 pattern), and 5-4-3-2-1 grounding technique. Payment system is MOCKED - /access-check always returns has_access: true during beta period.
mocked_api_notes: Stripe payment endpoints are bypassed. /api/auth/access-check returns {has_access: true, reason: 'beta_period'} for all authenticated users.
features_tested: Landing page with Get Started button
User signup (POST /api/auth/signup) - returns token and user data
User login (POST /api/auth/login) - returns token and user data
Protected routes redirect to /signup when unauthenticated
Results page displays total score (out of 30) with nervous system activation level
Breathing exercise (4-4-6 pattern) with Start/Pause/Reset controls
Beta access check returns unlimited access for all users
